title: apply go 1.1.2 patches to release-branch.go1
body:
Here's the list of 1.1.2 issues:
https://code.google.com/p/go/issues/list?can=1&;q=label:Go1.1.2&sort=-closed&colspec=ID%20Status%20Stars%20Priority%20Owner%20Reporter%20Summary%20Closed

And here is the list of corresponding fixes, in the order they should be applied.

issue #4230 : cmd/gc: fix pointer composite literals in exported if statements.
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7639aa719ae8

issue #5755 : cmd/gc: fix missing export data for inlining in a few other cases.
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c224c549a3c7

issue #5745 : time: prevent a panic from leaving the timer mutex held
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=974a69ed9fcf

issue #5753 : cmd/gc: fix issue with method wrappers not having escape analysis run on
them.
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=58e15340e78f

issue #5809 : cmd/6g, cmd/8g: prevent constant propagation of non-constant LEA.
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cf792c00f410

issue #5724 : runtime: properly set G status after syscall
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=fab6ba2a2d10

issue #5820 : cmd/8g: Make clearfat non-interleaved with pointer calculations.
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dc24634de6c5

issue #5922 : runtime: prevent sysmon from polling network excessivly
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6b3c351c7fe6

issue #5841 and issue #5905 are as-yet unresolved.
